title: SEAFORT INT / AFTERDOLORES TALK
description: Load to this from dream seafort dolores dei dialogue end.

dialogueTree.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You're up quick... How was your sl..."
dialogueTree.text: "You're up quick... How was your sleep?"

links.title: You: ""Let's solve the fucking case.""
links.text: "Let's solve the fucking case."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We already solved the case, rememb..."
links.text: "We already solved the case, remember? You were sleeping."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You thrashed around, then you bolt..."
links.text: "You thrashed around, then you bolted up, half-covered in blood from your wound. Are you okay?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Are you sure you're okay? You thra..."
links.text: "Are you sure you're okay? You thrashed around, then you bolted up, half-covered in blood from your wound."

links.title: You: ""My sleep was deep and invigorating..."
links.text: "My sleep was deep and invigorating." (Try to cover up the blood seeping out with your hands.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Of course. I was just thinking may..."
links.text: "Of course. I was just thinking maybe you've torn your stitches... Are you ready to move on?"

links.title: You: ""Actually -- it was total annihilat..."
links.text: "Actually -- it was total annihilation, Kim."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He frowns. "I did not want to wake..."
links.text: He frowns. "I did not want to wake you -- perhaps I should have? Was it a job dream?"

links.title: You: ""No, an ex-wife dream.""
links.text: "No, an ex-wife dream."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant nods solemnly."
links.text: The lieutenant nods solemnly.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "I understand -- we've all been thro..."
links.text: I understand -- we've all been through similar things. It can be overcome.

links.title: You: ""Yeah. About the job.""
links.text: "Yeah. About the job."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Don't worry, detective. We've solv..."
links.text: "Don't worry, detective. We've solved the case. It's wrapped and done." He looks north. "Are you ready?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Don't worry, detective. We'll solv..."
links.text: "Don't worry, detective. We'll solve the case. Are you ready?"

links.title: You: ""Fuck it.""
links.text: "Fuck it."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Of course," the lieutenant nods. "..."
links.text: "Of course," the lieutenant nods. "You ready?"

links.title: You: "(Swallow the blood and conclude.) "..."
links.text: (Swallow the blood and conclude.) "Let's comb the entire island, centimetre by centimetre. That's the next step in the *task chain*."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay," he replies simply."
links.text: "Okay," he replies simply.

links.title: Empathy: "He's still worried. You must have r..."
links.text: He's still worried. You must have really thrashed and squealed in your sleep.

links.title: You: "(Swallow the blood and conclude.) "..."
links.text: (Swallow the blood and conclude.) "Let's get our perp to confess to the murder. That's the next step in the *task chain*."

links.title: You: "(Swallow the blood and conclude.) "..."
links.text: (Swallow the blood and conclude.) "Let's get that motive out of our perp. That's the next step in the *task chain*."

links.title: You: "(Swallow the blood and conclude.) "..."
links.text: (Swallow the blood and conclude.) "Let's arrest the perp. That's the next step in the *task chain*."

links.title: You: "(Swallow the blood and conclude.) "..."
links.text: (Swallow the blood and conclude.) "Let's investigate that gigantic insect. That's the next step in the *task chain*."

links.title: You: "(Swallow the blood and conclude.) "..."
links.text: (Swallow the blood and conclude.) "Let's talk to our perp again. That's the next step in the *task chain*."

links.title: You: "(Swallow the blood and conclude.) "..."
links.text: (Swallow the blood and conclude.) "Let's get back to the mainland. That's the next step in the *task chain*."

links.title: You: "Just spit out the blood and get bac..."
links.text: Just spit out the blood and get back to work. You're bad ass like that.

dialogueTree.title: Cuno: ""Whoa there, man. You've been squea..."
dialogueTree.text: "Whoa there, man. You've been squealing and thrashing around, crazy. And now -- you're bleeding too... again." He stares in awe at the streaks of blood covering your body.

links.title: You: ""I'm fine, really." (Try to cover u..."
links.text: "I'm fine, really." (Try to cover up the blood seeping out with your hands.) "I'm super mega fine."

links.title: Cuno: ""Sure, sure. That's why you mumbled..."
links.text: "Sure, sure. That's why you mumbled about bitches. Real fine."

links.title: You: ""So I talked in my sleep?""
links.text: "So I talked in my sleep?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah. No biggie, don't shit yourse..."
links.text: "Yeah. No biggie, don't shit yourself. All the worst dreams are about bitches -- you wouldn't *believe* the shit Cuno sees about C..."

links.title: Empathy: "It's not good, this C in his dreams..."
links.text: It's not good, this C in his dreams.

links.title: Cuno: ""Now let's get this shit back on th..."
links.text: "Now let's get this shit back on the road, yo. Just make sure you don't die." He glances at your blood-covered hands. "Cuno's no fucking mortician."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "However bad it is, pig, we go on, d..."
links.text: However bad it is, pig, we go on, deputy Cuno thinks. We detect. There's nothing more.

links.title: You: ""How did you know?""
links.text: "How did you know?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno knows that shit. All the wors..."
links.text: "Cuno knows that shit. All the worst dreams are about bitches -- you wouldn't *believe* the shit Cuno sees about C..."

links.title: You: "Just grunt in pain."
links.text: Just grunt in pain.

links.title: Cuno: ""Right. Pig takes it like a man. Go..."
links.text: "Right. Pig takes it like a man. Good for you. Bitches always tryna' damage you with *psi* weapons. *Psi* style -- you wouldn't *believe* the shit Cuno sees about C..."

links.title: You: ""Cuno... I had this..." (Shake your..."
links.text: "Cuno... I had this..." (Shake your head) "Fucking dream..."

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah, Cuno saw that. A nightmare a..."
links.text: "Yeah, Cuno saw that. A nightmare about bitches."

dialogueTree.title: Inland Empire: "Your surroundings are undisturbed...."
dialogueTree.text: Your surroundings are undisturbed. While you slept, you were alone. Now that you're awake -- you're still alone.

links.title: Half Light: "Get the fuck out of here. Fuck this..."
links.text: Get the fuck out of here. Fuck this place, fuck this world, fuck this life, fuck this body -- just fucking go.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "The sheets are stained red. Your bl..."
links.text: The sheets are stained red. Your blood's been running again. Keep it together. Just get out of here and finish this fucking thing.

links.title: Volition: "Harry... I know there's not much to..."
links.text: Harry... I know there's not much to say -- but if nothing else, just remember that you've made it this far. And it's just a bit farther now. Let's finish this.
